articles.content: Indian benchmark indices ended higher for the third straight session on June 13. At close, the Sensex was up 204.33 points or 0.27 percent at 76,810.90, and the Nifty was up 75.90 points or 0.33 perc… [+2644 chars]

articles.author: Harsh Upadhyay
articles.title: South Park Commons enters India in collaboration with Binny Bansal - Entrackr
articles.description: South Park Commons (SPC) has announced the opening of its first international location in Bengaluru in collaboration with Binny Bansal.

articles.title: 2024-06-13 L&T Wins (Large*) Offshore Order from ONGC - L&T
articles.description: Mumbai, June 13, 2024: The Hydrocarbon vertical (L&T Energy) of Larsen & Toubro (L&T) has secured an order from the Oil & Natural Gas Corporation (ONGC) for Daman Upside Development Project-Wellhead Platforms & Pipelines (DUDP-WP), off India’s west coast.

articles.title: BMW R 1300 GS launched in India at Rs. 20.95 lakh - BikeWale
articles.description: BMW Motorrad has launched the R 1300 GS, its latest flagship adventure motorcycle in India. The asking price starts from Rs. 20,95,00 (ex-showroom, Delhi).
articles.content:
- Available in four variants
- Powered by a 1,300cc, liquid-cooled, boxer engine
- The variants differ in terms of colours, features and equipment
